title: WTB: T205 Cubs with tougher backs

posts.post_title: WTB: T205 Cubs with tougher backs
posts.post_content:

Geno

I can dream can't I? :D

Thanks as usual Geno,

Nate
Picked up a Mordecai Brown Cycle recently, but not much is surfacing.
Sorry to bombard with my want lists. This is the first bump in a while, and I've hit a road block on acquiring more! There are a couple on eBay, but sellers won't budge on them.
